rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about refugees, but it's not clear what action you want the Government to take.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Help Asylum Seekers in UK during the Covid-19 Outbreak: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311322

Amnesty for UK undocumented immigrants in this COVID-19 World pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312998
